name: Trucks Off Road
description:
TRUCKS OFF ROAD – Setting a new standard in mud and offroad graphics, TOR delivers an authentic action-packed mudfest to the palm of your hand. This game is a celebration of mudding and bogging in your pocket!

Compete in the world class superbog events at the world's best mud parks with your custom-built mega monster trucks.

CONSOLE GRAPHICS
Mud so real you’ll feel dirty! TOR redefines mudding and bogging on a mobile device, we got realistic mud for those who like it dirty and realistic water for those lying to themselves. And real-time truck damage and physics for those who like to punish their rides.

BUILD AND CUSTOMIZE
Want to wrench on your truck by upgrading mechanical items such as engine blocks for more cubes, blowers for the whistle noise, exhausts to rattle your teeth, radiators to keep things chilled, turbochargers to suck it all in, transmissions to shift hard, axles that go hard and suspensions that’ll cater for your every adjustment – we’ll we got you covered. Or what if you like your truck to stand out in a crowd with trick paint, that sticker bombed look with decals, some straight up tough looking rims and tires that’ll plough through anything – yeah we got you covered there too. We got everything you need to send it! And when your garage runs out of space, yep you guessed it we got you covered with larger garages to store more mud trucks!

PROVING GROUNDS
Compete in licensed mud parks in Freestyle, Obstacle Course, Mud Drag, Mud Bogging and Open Play events or take on Career mode to earn Championship Belts.

UPGRADE AND TUNE
Truck upgrades are only the start. Tune your truck with ride heights and tire pressures when going deep in the mud.


Make sure you play with your device connected to the internet to gain access to the latest content and features, and to ensure that your profile is backed up.
